PAD_Use.synopsis: The player sits on Ketherics throne. They feel powerful, though their companions are not convinced. .
PAD_Use.how_to_trigger: Sit on Ketherics throne in the execution room after the execution scene is over.Only triggers once, use "oe mooresetthrone" to reset it so it can be triggered again.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only one session 'PAD_Use' is provided, so there are no ordering or exclusiveness constraints with any other sessions. Therefore, no rules for ordering or mutual exclusivity can be established.

PAD_Use_2.speaker: Narrator
PAD_Use_2.text: *From this seat, Ketheric defied gods and raised an army for the Absolute.*
PAD_Use_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Grand shot of Ketheric's hall over the player's shoulder.

PAD_Use_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Use_0.text: Don't get used to it. One taste of regal power might have you craving more.
